casebody.data:
Shawana LAYNE (f/k/a Shawana Singleton), as Guardian Ad Litem and Next Friend to Frank Lee Layne, Jr., Plaintiffs Below/Appellants,
v.
GAVILON GRAIN, LLC (d/b/a Peavey Company), Jair Cabrera, Defendants Below/Appellees. No. 249, 2017 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: January 24, 2018
Decided: February 7, 2018

AFFIRMED.
